Structure# ConditionalAttachmentContent

RealityKitSwiftUIvisionOS 1.0+

```
@frozen
struct ConditionalAttachmentContent<TrueContent, FalseContent>
```

## [Relationships](/documentation/realitykit/conditionalattachmentcontent#relationships)

### [Conforms To](/documentation/realitykit/conditionalattachmentcontent#conforms-to)

- [`AttachmentContent`](/documentation/realitykit/attachmentcontent)Conforms when `TrueContent` conforms to `AttachmentContent` and `FalseContent` conforms to `AttachmentContent`.

- [`Copyable`](/documentation/Swift/Copyable)
